content: glamping beanie by brittany petko machete shoppe materials 125yds approx dk weight yarn or 2 strands fingering weight yarn held together for a marled effect sample knit in machete shoppe dirty dk 245yds/100g 3 25 mm 16 circular needle 4 mm 16 circular needle or size necessary to obtain gauge 1 stitch marker gauge 20 sts and 30 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch with 4mm needles sizing to fit approximate woman s size medium head 21 - 23 inches 7 inches tall glamping beanie i macheteshoppe com i 2017 brittany petko i not for commercial use brim decrease with smaller needles cast on 104 sts round 29 * k6 k2tog* repeat to end of join to work in the round being round careful not to twist round 30 knit pm to mark beginning of round round 31 purl work 13 rnds of 1x1 ribbing round 32 *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of change to larger needles round round 33 knit body round 34-36 repeats rounds 4-6 round 37 knit rnds 1-3 knit round 38 *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of round 4 purl round round 5 *yo k2tog* repeat to end of round 39-40 knit round round 6 purl round 7-10 knit finishing round 11 purl next round work 1x1 ribbing repeat rounds 1-11 one more time k2tog first two stitches then repeat rounds 1-6 one more time continue in ribbing pattern round 28 knit next 4 rounds continue 1x1 ribbing cast of loosely glamping beanie i macheteshoppe com i 2017 brittany petko i not for commercial use
